body:
When I build boost@1.56.0 with gcc@5.4.0 I get a complaint about the call_once_variadic patch already having been applied and etc....

#5691 fixes it by changing the patch's constraint from `:1.56.0` to `:1.55.0`, but I do not know if that is actually appropriate.
title: boost@1.56.0^gcc@5.4.0 complains about reversed patch.
